Name: nonsyndromic deafness
Definition: An auditory system disease that is associated with permanent hearing loss caused by damage to structures in the inner ear and/or the middle ear

Name: discharging ear
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results in infection in sheep and rarely humans
Synonym: vitamin A deficiency with conjunctival xerosis (disorder)

Name: obsolete Mumps virus hepatitis
Definition: A Mumps virus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in liver

Name: dislocation of ear ossicle
Definition: A hypersensitivity vasculitis that is characterized by purpura (purplish plaques)

Name: obsolete malignant esophageal neoplasm by anatomic region
Definition: A hypersensitivity vasculitis that is characterized by purpura (purplish plaques)

Name: adhesive otitis media
Definition: An auditory system disease that is characterized by a thin retracted ear drum becomes sucked into the middle-ear space and stuck (i.e.

Name: necrosis of ear ossicle
Definition: A refractive error characterized by the optics of the eye to focus a point object into a sharp focused image on the retina
Synonym: partial loss or necrosis of ear ossicles

Name: retrocochlear disease
Definition: A male reproductive organ benign neoplasm that derives_from smooth muscle cells and that is located_in the prostate.

Name: inner ear disease
Definition: A Reoviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in vertebrates

Name: obsolete intra-abdominal lymphangioma
Definition: A Reoviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in vertebrates

Name: external ear disease
Definition: An X-linked dominant disease that is characterized by skeletal malformations

Name: middle ear disease
Definition: An auditory system cancer that is located_in the middle ear.

Name: auditory system cancer
Definition: An organ system cancer located_in the ear and characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation of the auditory organs.
Synonym: Resectable carcinoma of the Small Bowel
